solution_line_template: There are {trumpet_multiplier} trumpets/flute x {flute_members} flutes = <<{trumpet_multiplier}*{flute_members}={trumpet_players}>>{trumpet_players} trumpet players
There are {trumpet_players} players - {fewer_trombone_than_trumpet} players = <<{trumpet_players}-{fewer_trombone_than_trumpet}={trombone_players}>>{trombone_players} trombone players
There are {clarinet_multiplier} clarinets/flute x {flute_members} flutes = {clarinet_players} clarinet players

There are {trombone_players} players + {more_french_horn_than_trombone} players = <<{trombone_players}+{more_french_horn_than_trombone}={french_horn_players}>>{french_horn_players} French horn players

In total {flute_members} players + {trumpet_players} players + {trombone_players} players + {drummers} players + {clarinet_players} players + {french_horn_players} players = <<{flute_members}+{trumpet_players}+{trombone_players}+{drummers}+{clarinet_players}+{french_horn_players}={total_seats_needed}>>{total_seats_needed} seats needed.
